CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The X position of where the camera is looking.
CONTROLS.NAME: lookatme_x

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The X position of where the camera is located.
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_x

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The Y position of where the camera is looking.
CONTROLS.NAME: lookatme_y

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The Y position of where the camera is.
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_y

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: A toggle for a white glow on the edges of the geometry.
CONTROLS.NAME: EdgeGlow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Toggle for a white background. Blends with EdgeGlow
CONTROLS.NAME: lightbackground

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Changes which direction the entire fractal is twisting.
CONTROLS.NAME: twistdirection

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Changes the intestity of the twist.
CONTROLS.NAME: twistamount

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adjust the sensitivity of the sound-reactive movement.
CONTROLS.NAME: reactivetime

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: displace the media based on the geometery position.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_displacement

DESCRIPTION: A raymarched fractal with sound-reactive movement and a moving camera!
TITLE: Vortex Flythrough_dup
